lyrics.text:
Ko e me’a ‘ia Sīsū
Mo ‘ene pekia;
‘Oku tu’umālie ai
‘A e halaia.

Pea fai fakatomala
‘E he angahia;
‘I he’ene talangata’a,
Ki hono ‘Otua.

Pea hoko ‘o ongo’i
‘A e Folofola;
Pea loto manavahē
‘I he’ene hia.

Pea feinga mamahi
‘I he’ene vaivai
Pea mo e tu’utāmaki,
Ki he mate kovi.
5 Pea ne hoko ‘o ‘ilo
Ko e fu’u masiva;
Pea ko e houhau ia,
Mo e mafasia.
